TopicTitle: I'm full of excitement and coffee!

Articles.Content:
Ok...sorry about the title but that last thread was around for awhile

Anyways, so this is more of a "hell yeah SQUAD you all ROCK" instead of whats been going down on here...

I felt it necessary to make a post as it is my birthday and It seems SQUAD figured this out and I wanted to thank them for releasing it today! For the record, I've tried it, and it worked amazingly well, granted I just threw together some silly thing just to test out and see what everyone was complaining about. I did see the difference in how it works and why its giving some people a hard time, but I have a feeling that's the way they designed it to be, and if you just compensate for the "not instant moving of your ship" then you can get along just fine.

Anyways, I'll try out some more later. I did take a screen of the ship I got into orbit with absolutely no issues, and a bit of fuel leftover, which was not meant to be..lol

*EDIT* I even forgot to put RCS thrusters..LMAO!

Again, hats off to SQUAD amazing work guys keep it up!

Hello. I am Whackjob, and I endorse the title of this thread.

And I agree with the celebratory hat tip. With this patch... I am enthused.
I can't wait to finally fly long distances with planes under 4x warp!
